articles.description: The Epic Games Store kicked off its annual Mega Sale by offering Grand Theft Auto 5 for free this week.
articles.content: Epic Games Store's next free game is a big one: Epic has confirmed Grand Theft Auto V - Premium Edition is the next free game available to claim and keep. GTA V is free now until Thursday, May 21, at 8 AM PT / 11 AM ET, when it'll be replaced by next week's f… [+3372 chars]

articles.author: Lexy Savvides
articles.title: New iPhone SE 2020 vs. iPhone 11 Pro: Apple's budget and flagship iPhones compared - CNET
articles.description: We compare the specs and day-to-day performance of these two iPhones to see how they stack up.
articles.content: The iPhone 11 Pro is undoubtedly the king of Apple's iPhone lineup thanks to its three rear cameras, all-day battery life and high-resolution OLED screen. But it commands a steep price, starting at $999 (£1,049, AU$1,749). With so many new iPhones out there, … [+8109 chars]

articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.title: The Wonderful 101 will be no less divisive in remastered form - The Verge
articles.description: Lost Wii U classic The Wonderful 101 is getting rereleased on the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and PC. But does it hold up, and does the remaster make a difference?
articles.content: A lost Wii U classic gets a shot at a bigger audience

articles.title: Google’s experimental ‘smart braid’ headphone wire controls music with a squeeze - The Verge

Facebook

articles.title: iOS 14 may have a new AR app that can read Apple-branded QR codes - The Verge

articles.content: The new app could be called Gobi
